name: Chess PGN Pro
description:
View Chess Portable Game Notation (PGN) files, add them using iTunes>App>File sharing. Features:
* Create , Edit or Modify PGN file, game info, moves and comments.
* Favourite games per PGN file
* Annotation and Comments supported (tap over comment section at bottom)
* Variation
* Search and sort by tags(events, elo ect.)
* PGN with FEN tag support
